accessories.description: An alcohol-free formula, this multi-purpose lens cleaner is great for all lens types without streaking. Supplied in a clear bottle with pump action, it is also available in 4 different sizes as well as a refill bottle.

accessories.product: Standard Matte Textured Black Glasses Case Case
accessories.description: The Mens Ray-Ban Sunglasses Standard Matte Textured Black Case (Standard Matte Textured Black Case RAT240R00) is available to buy from Shade Station. It features a frame which is standard matte textured black case. The Standard Matte Textured Black Case RAT240R00 comes with an official Ray-Ban Sunglasses 2 year guarantee.
